message:
SYSTEM: FernandezM.Feb2019.pdf: Página 32
Results concerning Objective 3. Factors against reuse
across the same domain
Factors identiﬁed while building our domain ontology
1 Predominant use of English and conceptualizations biased towards the
Anglo-Saxon world.
2 Deﬁciencies in the documentation
3 Loss of information due to an imported ontology that is not available.
4 Unavailable license.
5 Heterogeneity between the subdomains of the reusing and the reused
ontologies.
Fern´andez, Poveda, Su´arez, G´omez
Ontology reuse across the same domain
February 21, 2019
32 / 43
speaker: SYSTEM
